name: prospectpro-verified-business-intelligence
description: ProspectPro - Verified Business Intelligence Platform with Zero Fake Data Policy

scripts.archive:legacy: mkdir -p archive/legacy-server && mv server.js api/ modules/ docker/ archive/legacy-server/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Legacy files managed separately'
scripts.build: tsc && vite build && echo '{"version":2,"rewrites":[{"source":"/(.*)","destination":"/index.html"}],"headers":[{"source":"/(.*)","headers":[{"key":"Cache-Control","value":"public, max-age=0, s-maxage=0, must-revalidate"}]},{"source":"/assets/(.*)","headers":[{"key":"Cache-Control","value":"public, max-age=31536000, immutable"}]}]}' > dist/vercel.json
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ node_modules/ && echo 'Cleaned build artifacts'
scripts.cost:analyze: echo 'Check GitHub billing dashboard for usage trends'
scripts.docs:update: npm run codebase:index && npm run system:reference
scripts.db:status: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest db status'
scripts.debug:edge-function: echo 'Test Verified Edge Function: curl -X POST https://sriycekxdqnesdsgwiuc.supabase.co/functions/v1/business-discovery-background -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_SESSION_JWT" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"businessType\": \"test\", \"location\": \"test\"}"'
scripts.debug:fake-data: echo 'Verify zero fake data: Check CSV exports for pattern emails (info@, contact@, etc.)'
scripts.debug:quick: echo 'Common issue: Check anon key sync and verified contact authentication'
scripts.deploy:critical: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy business-discovery-background --no-verify-jwt && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy enrichment-orchestrator'
scripts.deploy:diagnostics: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy test-google-places'
scripts.deploy:discovery: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy business-discovery-background --no-verify-jwt && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy business-discovery-optimized && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy business-discovery-user-aware'
scripts.deploy:enrichment: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy enrichment-orchestrator && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy enrichment-hunter && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy enrichment-neverbounce && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy enrichment-business-license && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy enrichment-pdl'
scripts.deploy:exports: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions deploy campaign-export-user-aware'
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run deploy:discovery && npm run deploy:enrichment && npm run deploy:exports && npm run deploy:diagnostics
scripts.deploy:gcs: npm run build && gsutil -m rsync -r -d ./dist/ gs://prospectpro-static-frontend/
scripts.dev:supabase: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions serve --no-verify-jwt --debug'
scripts.frontend:deploy: npm run build && cd dist && vercel --prod
scripts.functions:list: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions list'
scripts.functions:logs: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions logs'
scripts.health: echo 'Use Edge Function endpoints for health checks'
scripts.logs:errors: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions logs --filter=error'
scripts.logs:live: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions logs --follow'
scripts.mcp:init: npm run mcp:install && npm run mcp:test
scripts.static:deploy: npm run build && cd dist && vercel --prod
scripts.supabase:db:pull: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest db pull --schema public'
scripts.supabase:db:push: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest migration list && npx --yes supabase@latest db push'
scripts.supabase:link: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest link --project-ref sriycekxdqnesdsgwiuc'
scripts.supabase:migrations:list: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest migration list'
scripts.supabase:migrations:new: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && read -p "Migration name: " name && npx --yes supabase@latest migration new "$name"'
scripts.supabase:status: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest status'
scripts.supabase:types: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest gen types --lang typescript > ../src/types/supabase.ts'
scripts.supabase:test:db: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest test db'
scripts.supabase:test:functions: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && deno test --allow-all functions/tests/'
scripts.supabase:workflow: npm run supabase:auth && npm run supabase:link && npm run supabase:migrations:list
scripts.edge:serve: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions serve --no-verify-jwt --debug'
scripts.edge:serve:single: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && read -p "Function name: " func && npx --yes supabase@latest functions serve "$func" --no-verify-jwt --debug'
scripts.edge:logs: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions logs --follow'
scripts.edge:logs:errors: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions logs --filter=error --follow'
scripts.edge:logs:function: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && read -p "Function name: " func && npx --yes supabase@latest functions logs "$func" --follow'
scripts.edge:list: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions list'
scripts.edge:new: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && read -p "Function name: " func && npx --yes supabase@latest functions new "$func"'
scripts.edge:workflow:dev: bash -lc 'npm run edge:serve & sleep 5 && npm run edge:logs'
scripts.edge:workflow:deploy: bash -lc 'npm run edge:deploy:critical && npm run edge:logs'
scripts.test:edge-functions: bash -lc 'cd supabase && source ../scripts/ensure-supabase-cli-session.sh && npx --yes supabase@latest functions serve'
scripts.test:verified-contacts: echo 'Test verified contact discovery with zero fake data validation'

author: Alex Torelli

architecture.frontend: Static HTML/JS with verified contact display
architecture.backend: Supabase Edge Functions with zero fake data
architecture.contacts: Apollo API + Professional Licensing + Chamber Directories
architecture.dataPolicy: Zero fake data - verified contacts only
